description.value:
Your Inspire Courage lets loose a discordant shriek that imbues your allies' attacks with powerful sonic reverberations.

While your allies are affected by your @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.spells-srd.Inspire Courage]{Inspire Courage}, their weapon strikes and unarmed attacks deal an additional [[/r 1d6[sonic]]] damage.

@UUID[Compendium.xprpg.feat-effects.Effect: Discordant Voice]{Effect: Discordant Voice}
